segments.text: Good morning , Miss Mandy . How are you today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not feeling very well . I've got a bad cold .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you got a sore throat , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but I've got a headache .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I see . Go home to bed and take one of these pills every three hours .
segments.speaker: S2
